sentences.en: It is from the Bible that man has learned cruelty, rapine and murder; for the belief of a cruel God makes a cruel man.
sentences.cn: 从基督教《圣经》人们学会了残忍、掠夺和谋杀，因对一个残忍的神的信仰造成了一个残忍的人。

sentences.en: It is not enough that ecclesiastical men abstain from violence and rapine and all manner of persecution.
sentences.cn: 仅仅教士自身放弃暴力和掠夺以及所有迫害的方式还是不够的。

sentences.en: The soldiers got their food by rapine.
sentences.cn: 士兵们靠抢劫获得食品.

trans.tran_en: the seizure of property by force; pillage
